mapper.insert: insert into users (user_id, user_name, user_intro, user_profile_image_filename, phone, email, address, detailed_address, birthdate, pw, nickname) values (#{userId}, #{userName}, null, #{profileImageFilename}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{address}, #{detailedAddress}, #{birthdate}, #{pw}, #{nickname})
mapper.select: select user_id, nickname, user_name, phone, email, is_suspended from users order by user_id
select count(user_id) from users where has_admin_rights = 0
select user_id, nickname, user_name, phone, email, is_suspended from users where user_id like '%' || #{userId} || '%' order by user_id
